trans-unit.source: Clear your entire browsing session history, passwords, cookies anytime with a single tap.

trans-unit.source: Take private browsing to the next level. Block ads and other content that can track you across sites and bog down page load times.

Title for the first panel 'Welcome' in the First Run tour.

trans-unit.target: ຮຽນຮູ້ເພີ່ມເຕີມ
trans-unit.note: Button on About screen

trans-unit.source: %@ is produced by Mozilla. Our mission is to foster a healthy, open Internet.
trans-unit.target: %@ ໄດ້ຖືກສ້າງຂື້ນມາໂດຍ Mozilla. ພາລະກິດຂອງພວກເຮົາແມ່ນເພື່ອສົ່ງເສີມການນຳໃຊ້ອິນເເຕີເນັດແບບເປີດ ແລະ ສົມບູນ.
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Search and browse right in the app
trans-unit.target: ຄົ້ນຫາ ແລະ ທ່ອງເວັບຈາກໃນແອັບ
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Block trackers (or update settings to allow trackers)
trans-unit.target: ບັອກຕົວຕິດຕາມ (ຫລື ອັບເດດການຕັ້ງຄ່າເພື່ອອະນຸຍາດຕົວຕິດຕາມ)
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Erase to delete cookies as well as search and browsing history
trans-unit.target: ລົບລ້າງຄຸກກີ້ລວມທັງປະຫວັດການຄົ້ນຫາ ແລະ ການທ່ອງເວັບ
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.note: Label on button to dismiss first run UI

trans-unit.source: Automatically block online trackers while you browse. Then tap to erase visited pages, searches, cookies and passwords from your device.
trans-unit.target: ມັນຈະບັອກຕົວຕິດຕາມອອນໄລນ໌ແບບອັດຕະໂນມັດໃນຂະນະທີ່ທ່ານກຳລັງທ່ອງເວັບຢູ່. ຫລັງຈາກນັ້ນໃຫ້ແຕະເພື່ອລົບລ້າງຫນ້າເວັບທີ່ທ່ານໄດ້ເຂົ້າໄປເບິງ, ການຄົ້ນຫາ, ຄຸກກີ້ ແລະ ລະຫັດຜ່ານອອກຈາກອຸປະກອນຂອງທ່ານ.
trans-unit.note: Message label on the first run screen

trans-unit.target: ທ່ອງເວັບແບບບໍ່ມີໃຜມາຫລັກເຝົ້າຕິດຕາມ.
trans-unit.note: Message label on the first run screen

trans-unit.source: Blocking other content trackers may break some videos and Web pages.
trans-unit.target: ການບັອກຕົວຕິດຕາມຂອງເນື້ອຫາຕ່າງໆອາດຈະເຮັດໃຫ້ບາງວິດີໂອ ແລະ ຫນ້າເວັບບໍ່ສົມບູນໄດ້.

trans-unit.note: Button label for accepting Content blocker alert

trans-unit.source: Mozilla strives to collect only what we need to provide and improve %@ for everyone.
trans-unit.target: Mozilla ພະຍາຍາມທີ່ຈະເກັບຮວບຮ່ວມສະເພາະສິ່ງທີ່ຈຳເປັນຕໍ່ການປັບປູງ %@ ສຳລັບທຸກໆຄົນ.

trans-unit.note: Label for toggle on main screen

trans-unit.source: Some ads track site visits, even if you don’t click the ads
trans-unit.target: ມີໂຄສະນາບາງໂຕສາມາດຕິດຕາມການເຂົ້າໄປເວັບຕ່າງໆ ເຖິງແມ່ນວ່າທ່ານຈະບໍ່ໄດ້ຄິກໃສ່ໂຄສະນານັ້ນເລີຍ
trans-unit.note: Description for 'Block ad Trackers'

trans-unit.target: ບັອກຕົວຕິດຕາມຂອງການວິເຄາະ
trans-unit.note: Label for toggle on main screen

trans-unit.source: Used to collect, analyze and measure activities like tapping and scrolling
trans-unit.target: ໃຊ້ເພື່ອເກັບກຳຮວບຮ່ວມ, ວິເຄາະ ແລະ ວັດແທກກິດຈະກຳເຊັນວ່າການແຕະ ແລະ ການເລື່ອນ
trans-unit.note: Description for 'Block analytics Trackers'

trans-unit.target: ບັອກຕົວອັກສອນເວັບ
trans-unit.note: Label for toggle on main screen

trans-unit.target: ບັອກຕົວຕິດຕາມຂອງເນື້ອຫາຕ່າງໆ
trans-unit.note: Label for toggle on main screen

trans-unit.source: Enabling may cause some pages to behave unexpectedly
trans-unit.target: ການເປີດໃຊ້ງານອາດຈະເຮັດໃຫ້ບາງຫນ້າເຮັດວຽກຜຶດປົກກະຕິ
trans-unit.note: Description for 'Block other content Trackers'

trans-unit.target: ບັອກຕົວຕິດຕາມຂອງສືສັງຄົມອອນໄລນ໌
trans-unit.note: Label for toggle on main screen

trans-unit.source: Embedded on sites to track your visits and to display functionality like share buttons
trans-unit.target: ຝັງໄວ້ຢູ່ໃນເວັບໄຊທ໌ເພື່ອຕິດຕາມເບິງການເຂົ້າມາເບິງຂອງທ່ານ ແລະ ເພື່ອສະແດງຟັງຊັນເຊັ່ນວ່າປຸ່ມແບ່ງປັນ
trans-unit.note: Description for 'Block social Trackers'

trans-unit.source: May break some videos and Web pages
trans-unit.target: ອາດຈະເຮັດໃຫ້ບາງວິດີໂອ ແລະ ຫນ້າເວັບບໍ່ສົມບູນ
trans-unit.note: Label subtitle for toggle on main screen

trans-unit.target: Safari
trans-unit.note: Safari toggle label on settings screen

trans-unit.target: ສົ່ງຂໍ້ມູນການນຳໃຊ້
trans-unit.note: Label for Send Usage Data toggle on main screen

trans-unit.target: ສິງໃຫມ່ໆ
trans-unit.note: Title for What's new screen

trans-unit.target: ຕິດຕັ້ງແອັບ Firefox
trans-unit.note: Text for the share menu option when a user wants to open a page in Firefox but doesn’t have it installed. This string will not wrap in the interface. Instead, it will truncate. To prevent this, please keep the localized string to 18 or fewer characters. If your string runs longer than 18 characters, you can use 'Get Firefox' as the basis for your string. However, if at all possible, we’d like to signal to the user that they will be going to the App Store and installing the application from there. That is why we are using Get and App in the en-US string.

trans-unit.target: ເປີດໃນ %@
trans-unit.note: Text for the share menu option when a user wants to open a page in Focus.

trans-unit.target: ຍົກເລີກ
trans-unit.note: Label for cancel button shown when entering a URL or search

trans-unit.target: ວາງແລ້ວໄປ
trans-unit.note: Text for the URL context menu when a user long presses on the URL bar with clipboard contents.

trans-unit.target: ລຶບອອກ
trans-unit.note: Erase button in the URL bar

trans-unit.source: Your browsing history has been erased.
trans-unit.target: ປະຫວັດການທ່ອງເວັບຂອງທ່ານໄດ້ຖືກລຶບອອກແລ້ວ.

trans-unit.target: ເປີດໃນ %@
trans-unit.note: Title for action sheet item to open the current page in another application. Placeholder is the name of the application to open the current page.

trans-unit.target: ເລືອກຕຳແຫນ່ງທີ່ຕັ້ງບາ
trans-unit.note: Label to display in the Discoverability overlay for keyboard shortcuts

trans-unit.target: ລີ້ງທີ່ທ່ານໄດ້ສຳເນົາໄວ້: %@
trans-unit.note: Text for the context menu when a user has a link on their clipboard.

trans-unit.note: Text for the context menu when a user wants to copy an image after long pressing it.

trans-unit.source: This lets you save images to your Camera Roll

trans-unit.note: Title for button that takes the user to system settings

trans-unit.source: “%@” Would Like to Access Your Photos

Text for a share button
Text used when the user shares their trackers blocked stats

trans-unit.source: %1$@, the privacy browser from Mozilla, has already blocked %2$@ trackers for me. Fewer ads and trackers following me around means faster browsing! Get Focus for yourself here
trans-unit.note: The text shared to users after the user chooses to share there tracker stats

trans-unit.note: label for social trackers.

trans-unit.source: Disable until you close %@ or tap ERASE.

trans-unit.note: Text for the toggle that temporarily disables tracking protection.

trans-unit.source: Choose whether %@ blocks ad, analytic, social, and other trackers.
trans-unit.target: ເລືອກວ່າຈະໃຫ້ %@ ບັອກຕົວຕິດຕາມໂຄສະນາ, ການວິເຄາະ, ສືສັງຄົມ ແລະ ຕົວຕິດຕາມອື່ນໆ.
trans-unit.note: General description of tracking protection settings, which is displayed underneath the trackers preferences in Settings. Placeholder is either Firefox Focus or Firefox Klar
